name: CcasmStrainCollection
description: Metadata associated with the bacterial strains deposited in the Canadian Collection of Agricultural Soil Microbes (CCASM)
title: CCASM Strain Collection

WhitespaceMinimizedString.name: WhitespaceMinimizedString
WhitespaceMinimizedString.description: A string that has all whitespace trimmed off of beginning and end, and all internal whitespace segments reduced to single spaces. Whitespace includes x9 (tab), #xA (linefeed), and #xD (carriage return).

string.name: string
notes: In RDF serializations, a slot with range of string is treated as a literal or type xsd:string.   If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "string".

integer.name: integer
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "integer".

boolean.name: boolean
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "boolean".

float.name: float
float.description: A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "float".

double.name: double
double.description: A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "double".

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal specification
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "decimal".

time.name: time
time.description: A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular day
notes: URI is dateTime because OWL reasoners do not work with straight date or time
If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "time".

date.name: date
date.description: a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar
notes: URI is dateTime because OWL reasoners don't work with straight date or time
If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "date".

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.description: The combination of a date and time
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "datetime".

date_or_datetime.name: date_or_datetime
date_or_datetime.description: Either a date or a datetime
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "date_or_datetime".

uriorcurie.name: uriorcurie
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "uriorcurie".

curie.name: curie
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "curie".
comments: in RDF serializations this MUST be expanded to a URI
in non-RDF serializations MAY be serialized as the compact representation

uri.name: uri
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "uri".
comments: in RDF serializations a slot with range of uri is treated as a literal or type xsd:anyURI unless it is an identifier or a reference to an identifier, in which case it is translated directly to a node

ncname.name: ncname
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "ncname".

objectidentifier.name: objectidentifier
objectidentifier.description: A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model.
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "objectidentifier".
comments: Used for inheritance and type checking

nodeidentifier.name: nodeidentifier
nodeidentifier.description: A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model.
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "nodeidentifier".

jsonpointer.name: jsonpointer
jsonpointer.description: A string encoding a JSON Pointer. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to a valid object within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "jsonpointer".

jsonpath.name: jsonpath
jsonpath.description: A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "jsonpath".

sparqlpath.name: sparqlpath
sparqlpath.description: A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path. The value of the string MUST conform to SPARQL syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded as RDF.
notes: If you are authoring schemas in LinkML YAML, the type is referenced with the lower case "sparqlpath".

AllCaps.description: Entries of any length with only capital letters
AllCaps.title: AllCaps

AlphaText1-50.description: Capital or lower case letters only, at least 1 character, and 50 characters max
AlphaText1-50.title: AlphaText1-50

AlphaText0-50.description: Capital or lower case letters only, 50 characters max
AlphaText0-50.title: AlphaText0-50

PhoneNumber.description: Phone number with international and area code component.
PhoneNumber.title: PhoneNumber

Latitude.description: Latitude in formats S30°15'45.678" or N12°30.999"
Latitude.title: Latitude

Longitude.description: Longitude in formats E30°15'45.678" or W90°00.000"
Longitude.title: Longitude

ISO_YYYY-DDD.description: Ordinal date (day number from the year)
ISO_YYYY-DDD.title: ISO_YYYY-DDD

ISO_YYYYDDD.description: Ordinal date (day number from the year)
ISO_YYYYDDD.title: ISO_YYYYDDD

ISO_YYYY-MM-DDTHH.MM.SS-hh.mm.description: Date and Time Combined (with Timezone Offset)
ISO_YYYY-MM-DDTHH.MM.SS-hh.mm.title: ISO_YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±hh:mm

ISO_HH.MM.SS.description: hour, minutes, seconds in 24 hour notation
ISO_HH.MM.SS.title: ISO_HH:MM:SS

HH.MM.SS.description: hour, minutes, seconds 12 hour notation AM/PM
HH.MM.SS.title: HH:MM:SS

Other.title: Other method as indicated in notes
Other source as indicated in notes

CCASM_ID.name: CCASM_ID
CCASM_ID.description: The unique CCASM identifier of the strain
CCASM_ID.title: CCASM identifier

Manitoba_barcode.name: Manitoba_barcode
Manitoba_barcode.description: The barcode on the freezer vial of the replicate stored at the University of Manitoba
Manitoba_barcode.title: Manitoba freezer vial barcode

Manitoba_box_ID.name: Manitoba_box_ID
Manitoba_box_ID.description: The barcode on the freezer box of the replicate stored at the University of Manitoba
Manitoba_box_ID.title: Manitoba freezer box ID

Manitoba_box_name.name: Manitoba_box_name
Manitoba_box_name.description: The common name of the freezer box of the replicate stored at the University of Manitoba
Manitoba_box_name.title: Manitoba freezer box name

Manitoba_well.name: Manitoba_well
Manitoba_well.description: The position within the freezer box of the replicate stored at the University of Manitoba
Manitoba_well.title: Manitoba freezer box well position

Queens_barcode.name: Queens_barcode
Queens_barcode.description: The barcode on the freezer vial of the replicate stored at Queen\'s University
Queens_barcode.title: Queen's freezer vial barcode

Queens_box_ID.name: Queens_box_ID
Queens_box_ID.description: The barcode on the freezer box of the replicate stored at Queen\'s University
Queens_box_ID.title: Queen's freezer box ID

Queens_box_name.name: Queens_box_name
Queens_box_name.description: The common name of the freezer box of the replicate stored at Queen\'s University
Queens_box_name.title: Queen's freezer box name

Queens_well.name: Queens_well
Queens_well.description: The position within the freezer box of the replicate stored at Queen\'s University
Queens_well.title: Queen's freezer box well position

binomial_classification.name: binomial_classification
binomial_classification.description: The binomial classification (genus and species, if classified) of the isolate
binomial_classification.title: Binomial classification

citation.name: citation
citation.description: Citation of the study reporting the microbe, if available
citation.title: Citation

colony_morphology.name: colony_morphology
colony_morphology.description: Description of the colony morphology of the isolate
colony_morphology.title: Colony morphology

genome_ncbi_association.name: genome_ncbi_association
genome_ncbi_association.description: NCBI accession code(s) for the genome assembly of the microbe, if available
genome_ncbi_association.title: Genome NCBI accession

genome_size.name: genome_size
genome_size.description: The genome size of the microbe, if known
genome_size.title: Genome size

host_plant_species.name: host_plant_species
host_plant_species.description: The plant species from which the microbe was isolated, or that was planted in the soil from which the microbe was isolated
host_plant_species.title: Associated plant species

is_plant_pathogen.name: is_plant_pathogen
is_plant_pathogen.description: An indication of whether the strain is a known plant pathogen
is_plant_pathogen.title: Is the strain a plant pathogen

isolation_growth_medium.name: isolation_growth_medium
isolation_growth_medium.description: The name of the growth medium that was used to isolate the microbe
isolation_growth_medium.title: Isolation growth medium

isolation_growth_medium_composition.name: isolation_growth_medium_composition
isolation_growth_medium_composition.description: The full composition of the growth medium used to isolate the microbe
isolation_growth_medium_composition.title: Isolation growth medium composition

isolation_growth_temperature.name: isolation_growth_temperature
isolation_growth_temperature.description: The incubation temperature used when isolating the microbe
isolation_growth_temperature.title: Isolation growth temperature

isolation_protocol.name: isolation_protocol
isolation_protocol.description: The method used for isolating the microbe
isolation_protocol.title: Isolation protocol

isolation_soil_organic_matter.name: isolation_soil_organic_matter
isolation_soil_organic_matter.description: The organic matter content of the soil from which the microbe was isolated, if known and if relevant
isolation_soil_organic_matter.title: Isolation soil organic matter (%)

isolation_soil_ph.name: isolation_soil_ph
isolation_soil_ph.description: The pH of the soil from which the microbe was isolated, if known and if relevant
isolation_soil_ph.title: Isolation soil pH

isolation_soil_province.name: isolation_soil_province
isolation_soil_province.description: The province from which the soil (or plant material) was isolated
isolation_soil_province.title: Isolation soil province

isolation_soil_texture.name: isolation_soil_texture
isolation_soil_texture.description: The texture of the soil from which the microbe was isolated, if known and if relevant
isolation_soil_texture.title: Isolation soil texture

isolation_source.name: isolation_source
isolation_source.description: The source (soil or plant tissue type) that the microbe was isolated from
isolation_source.title: Isolation source

isolation_year.name: isolation_year
isolation_year.description: The year that the microbe was isolated
isolation_year.title: Isolation year

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.description: The latitude at which the soil or plant material was sampled
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.description: The longitude at which the soil or plant material was sampled
longitude.title: Longitute

risk_group.name: risk_group
risk_group.description: The risk group (1, 2, 3, 4) of the isolate, if known
risk_group.title: Risk group

strain_name.name: strain_name
strain_name.description: Other strain name(s) of the isolate
strain_name.title: Strain name(s)

taxonomic_lineage.name: taxonomic_lineage
taxonomic_lineage.description: The full taxonomic lineage of the isolate
taxonomic_lineage.title: Full taxonomic lineage
